Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class SocketID

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.SocketID
public class SocketID extends Object
This class is used to contain information about player's connection, each socket has an associated id PlayerInfo contains player's choices during the login phase.
